external.gw.xml

Interface XmlBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGosuObject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    XmlElement, XmlTypeInstance
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface XmlBase
extends IGosuObject
    The base of all XmlElements and XmlTypeInstances. Provides common methods to both, by delegating to the type instance.

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the text content. This might not be the same text content that will actually be written at serialization time due to special serialization-time handling of some simple types, such as xsd:QName or xsd:IDREF.

      • setText

        Deprecated.

        java.lang.String getAttributeValue(java.lang.String attributeName)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the string value of an attribute in the null namespace by local name. This may or may not be the same value that will eventually be serialized, such as in the case of QNames, IDREFs, and other special purpose simple types.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - The local name of the attribute in the null namespace
        Returns:
        the string value of the attribute, or null if the attribute is not set

      • setAttributeValue

        java.lang.String setAttributeValue(java.lang.String attributeName,
                                 java.lang.String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the string value of an attribute in the null namespace by local name. The attribute will lose any special simple type treatment, such as QName or IDREF handling, and will be serialized exactly as set by this method.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - The local name of the attribute in the null namespace
        value - The new string value of the attribute, or null to remove the attribute
        Returns:
        the old string value of the attribute, or null if the attribute was not previously set

      • setAttributeValue

        java.lang.String setAttributeValue(javax.xml.namespace.QName attributeName,
                                 java.lang.String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the string value of an attribute by name. The attribute will lose any special simple type treatment, such as QName or IDREF handling, and will be serialized exactly as set by this method.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - The name of the attribute
        value - The new string value of the attribute, or null to remove the attribute
        Returns:
        the old string value of the attribute, or null if the attribute was not previously set
